official_title: A joint resolution authorizing and requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the seven calendar days commencing on May 1 of each year as "Elks National Youth Week".

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the seven calendar days beginning on May 1 of each year as "Elks National Youth Week."
